profileAlternative.name: Rachel Y.
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Analyst at Merkle
profileAlternative.summary:
Highly analytical and detail-driven professional with the ability to leverage experience and partner in processes that ensure data integrity, produce data correlations, and perform data abstraction and reporting to meet regulatory and key service line reporting requirements. Adept in providing guidance and resolution on complex data issues, while identifying business requirements, creating project/process specifications, and ensuring projects are on schedule and within budget. Ability to quickly learn and assist with employing diverse data mining, forecasting and modeling techniques to analyze and summarize data trends and patterns. Strong knowledge in Probability, Regression Analysis, Stochastic Processes, Statistical Simulation and Nonstandard Data Analysis.

Software & Tools: SQL, Python, R, SAS, Tableau and Microsoft Office Suite (Advanced Excel (including VLOOKUP & Pivot Tables), Word, PowerPoint and Outlook)

Actively seeking a new and challenging role in data analytics.

educations.title: University of Science and Technology Beijing

items: Statistical Simulation and Nonstandard Data Analysis
Research on Extending the First-order Kinetic Model for Binary Components Adsorption
Research on China Urbanization – Hangzhou New Metropolis Space Developing Strategic Planning Project
The “Cradle of Steel” Academic Progress Outstanding Award
